trans-unit.source: A configuration element that represents a <xref href="System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityStateQuery"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um elemento de configuração que representa um <xref href="System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityStateQuery"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Tracking.Configuration.ActivityStateQueryElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Tracking.Configuration.ActivityStateQueryElement"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the activity to filter <xref href="System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityStateRecord"></xref> instances on.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome da atividade para filtrar <xref href="System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityStateRecord"> </xref> instâncias no.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Tracking.Configuration.ArgumentElementCollection"></xref> that contains the variables to filter <xref href="System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityStateRecord"></xref> on.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Tracking.Configuration.ArgumentElementCollection"> </xref> que contém as variáveis para filtrar <xref href="System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityStateRecord"> </xref> em.
A consulta do estado de atividade.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"></xref> that contains the properties of the configuration element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"> </xref> que contém as propriedades do elemento de configuração.
As propriedades de elemento de configuração.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Tracking.Configuration.StateElementCollection"></xref> that contains the states to filter <xref href="System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityStateRecord"></xref> on.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Tracking.Configuration.StateElementCollection"> </xref> que contém os estados para filtrar <xref href="System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityStateRecord"> </xref> em.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Tracking.Configuration.VariableElementCollection"></xref> that contains the variables to filter <xref href="System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityStateRecord"></xref> on.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Tracking.Configuration.VariableElementCollection"> </xref> que contém as variáveis para filtrar <xref href="System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityStateRecord"> </xref> em.
